website_summaries.verdict: An odorless, extra-long collar that adjusts to fit even large breeds.
pros: Best for pet owners who are sensitive to perfumes
it fits necks up to 28 inches
cons: The 0.02% DAP concentration may not be strong enough to help dogs with more severe anxiety or behavioral challenges

customer_reviews.title: Worked but on the wrong dog
customer_reviews.text: Worked on the wrong dog. I originally bought the collar for my anxious GSD but it wasn't effective on his nervous/anxious behavior. Ironically (with my GSD still wearing the collar) it has been helpful in calming my older Belgian Malinois mix. The collar is a great sturdy material, no scent, easy to put on, fits very well around my GSD larger neck and isn't too tight. I do recommend this product, however it may not be effective for every dog. Since the collar worked on my Belgian (even though he isn't wearing it) I will try the diffuser.
customer_reviews.author: Laura F

customer_reviews.title: It WORKS!!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: It actually really seems to work!! Shes (my german shepherd) has had it on since i got it for her, except one time,-- i took it off just to see if there was a difference in her level of anxiety and hyperactivity--and Boy was there a very noticeable difference, so i put it back on. With it on,-shes as good as gold, not nearly so reactive, anxious or shy, and is relaxed during car rides...!! Ill definitley be buying another one when this one is worn out. Worth the money if you have a tense, hyper/anxious, shy or nervous dog, or are planning to travel and your dog gets stressed during travel--I definitley reccomend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Ms. Moon

customer_reviews.title: Worked for my puppy whippet
customer_reviews.text: I first got this from my holistic vet for my out of control Whippet puppy. It calmed him down greatly. There was a genuine difference between the collar on and off. I've used it for about a year and highly recommend it for pets with a need for a slight calming. I'm not sure how beneficial it is for dogs who are bat sh)t crazy...my aunt rescued a dog who had survived pellet gun practice, a coyote attack that took off 1/2 his head, and God knows what else before she rescued him. The dog is still bat sh)t crazy even with this calming device - but I think it's because the dog needs psychotherapy.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Worked well for my anxious dog!
customer_reviews.text: I was skeptical about this product. My friend's vet gave them one for their cat, so I thought this couldn't hurt to try with my dog. We had just gotten a new puppy and one of my two adult dogs was freaked out about him. We started using this collar and within a day she was willing to come in the same room and wouldn't run away anymore. Left it on for a month (how long it's supposed to last) and she hasn't needed it since. Phew!
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: She's a good dog without behavior issues
customer_reviews.text: We bought this for use with a foster dog who is on crate rest. She's a good dog without behavior issues, but crate rest gets boring and we were having some issues with barking/whining. This collar kept her calm and quiet overnight. I took it off this morning, and she was back to her whiney self! It's definitely useful for certain dogs in certain situations... I'm not sure how it would work for a dog with serious anxiety, but for our bored pup, it kept her calm and let her get some much needed rest so she can heal.
customer_reviews.author: vkap+kjb

customer_reviews.title: Not for adult dogs with severe phobias
customer_reviews.text: I had hopes it would work. But it did not. Instead we went to our vet for a medical solution which has worked wonders. I think for puppies that may be anxious in a new home it would work, or for dogs without serious phobias. But if your dog reacts badly to certain situations you may just have to turn to your vet for medical solution.
customer_reviews.author: Odie's Mom

customer_reviews.title: It seems to do the trick for my pooch, ...
customer_reviews.text: It seems to do the trick for my pooch, for the most part. She is so anxious... This helps to calm her down a touch, and I can notice a difference in her when it's about time to replace it.
customer_reviews.author: Stacey

customer_reviews.title: and they take the worst edge off her fear
customer_reviews.text: I have bought several of these. They go on at the first lightning strike or firework, and they take the worst edge off her fear. She has slowly gotten better a little each time, and now when I put the collar on, she has taught herself to lie down and almost go into a trance. I use a thundershirt with it usually, and twice I gave her xanax from the vet. I got her as an older dog and did not expect this progress.
customer_reviews.author: Jane Wade

customer_reviews.title: Totally helps.
customer_reviews.text: I was very impressed, I have a little dog who is10.5 years old and having more anxiety issues as she gets older. She is on prescription med and also a a natural calm g treat called "mellows" from the vet and those helped us a lot especially during Thunder storms. However she was starting to tremble at just about everything. From the day I put the color on she has not trembled at anything. I am awaiting the first thunderstorm and hoping this will help get through those too. I would highly recommend, there is no smell at all and it is a good size (not too big or ugly) Blue plastic.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole Gordon

customer_reviews.title: Reduces nervousness
customer_reviews.text: ...doesn't eliminate it. This collar helped my rescued Tibetan Terrier with confrontational terror when approaching other dogs. Though she is still upset when she even sees another dog, her reaction is half what it used to be. I'm hoping this will become a habit, so that she will learn that these other dogs in the neighborhood are not going to attack her. Indoors, she less apt to bark at every noise outside in the hallway of my condo building. I wouldn't expect this to work on puppies or high energy breeds, especially if you're not adding positive reinforcement along with it.
customer_reviews.author: Roseann R.

customer_reviews.title: Works wonders for our neurotic Labrador/Golden Mix
customer_reviews.text: He has separation anxiety, storm anxiety, and, often, just no-one-knows-why anxiety; however, he is much more at ease when wearing this collar. He used to pant excessively, tear up the carpet, and climb on us to be as close as possible when he was feeling nervous (which was often). The collar hasn't taken it away 100% (he is still a bit nervous when we are away and still sits near us during storms), but it has significantly toned down the extremity of his behavior during an attack of anxiety. Keep in mind they are good for about a month (though that last week of the month we start to notice an slow increase in restlessness).
customer_reviews.author: Megan

customer_reviews.title: Natural Remedy
customer_reviews.text: When my elderly dog started chewing on furniture out of nowhere, my vet felt that he might've had some cognitive changes that were causing anxiety. She suggested trying one of these pheromone collars since they contain the natural pheromones secreted by nursing mothers. The change was instant! I bought the first one from the vet's office but found them much cheaper on Amazon. Now I buy several at a time so I can just change them on the first of the month. I'm interested in seeing if they help him deal with his fear of thunderstorms.
customer_reviews.author: 12pawsnme

customer_reviews.title: Worth trying!
customer_reviews.text: Have been using this collar for over 2 years on my hyper dog. I can definitely tell when I need to put a fresh collar on! Seeing all the negative reviews I want to add that it doesn't work on every dog and results can be different too, just like with flower essences remedies, but WORTH TRYING. It is absolutely safer option then behavior modifying drugs.
customer_reviews.author: Mike A.

customer_reviews.title: My dog has anxiety and her vet recommended I try it
customer_reviews.text: This really works! My dog has anxiety and her vet recommended I try it. I notice a difference. She actually slept through a thunderstorm instead of pacing and crying all night like she usually does. I just ordered another one. I think they are supposed to last about 30 days.
customer_reviews.author: Susan

customer_reviews.title: My wife really loved this product
customer_reviews.text: My wife really loved this product. I wasn't too sure about it. Our dog has always been kind of weird, so I didn't notice anything until after we removed the collar. Our dog appeared to be more obedient and attentive to commands while he was wearing the collar than when he wasn't. We ordered another pack and are hoping that it will make him less jumpy and aggressive around other people.
customer_reviews.author: jayblyons

customer_reviews.title: Helps my little buddy
customer_reviews.text: We adopted two jack Russell terriers from the shelter when they were six months old. Both have adjusted reasonably well but the smallest is very timid. He's the gentlest dog I've ever had, but goes through some moods when he's afraid of his own shadow. Nutracalm turns his "bolt out of the room" responses into "take a few steps, turn around and stay" responses. Well worth $15/month.
customer_reviews.author: Tom P

customer_reviews.title: It was difficult to say if this made a huge ...
customer_reviews.text: It was difficult to say if this made a huge difference for our anxious pup who licks his paws and butt excessively when we leave the house without him. However, once the 30 days were finished and we took the collar off, he did seem to be more anxious and wet when we got home. We will order another!
customer_reviews.author: Laura

customer_reviews.title: Meh.
customer_reviews.text: I used this on our 1 year old Akita whenever we left him alone, as he developed some separation anxiety after we moved into a new apartment. It didn't seem to help the anxiety, as far as I could tell; he still cried and got into the trash when he was left alone. But he did seem to be less restless when he'd wear it while people were home. Did a lot less pacing, anyway. I forgot to put it on him one time when I left him alone, and I came back to the collar and the bag it was stored in ripped to shreds. He didn't get into the trash, at least.
customer_reviews.author: Alicia

customer_reviews.title: Didn't work for my dog.
customer_reviews.text: I have a miniature dachshund that just gets ticked off and barks during thunder storms. He runs to the door barking as if he wants to attack it. Thought this might help. Got it for 4th of July also as my neighborhood sounds like a war zone. Didn't work for him. Product came in a timely manner and I know some people say it helps their dogs. No problem with seller at all.
customer_reviews.author: Marla Chase

customer_reviews.title: I think the collar is helping. We arehaving fewer ...
customer_reviews.text: I think the collar is helping. We arehaving fewer times of trembling. It hass no odor that I can detect, and so, if nothing else, it has not hurt. I will likely purchase another when this one wears out.
customer_reviews.author: Candace Warren

customer_reviews.title: THEY WORK WONDERS!!
customer_reviews.text: I was very skeptical about whether or not these would work. Well I'm amazed!! They must certainly do!! We just added a new adult rescue dog to our pack and I bought more of these to keep everyone calm. Absolutely HIGHLY RECOMMEND!!
customer_reviews.author: L. Pasternack

customer_reviews.title: Good item!
customer_reviews.text: These really work great for my 2 poodles. I have bought every month and can tell a difference in them when I forgot to put back on.
customer_reviews.author: Mary L Hilliard

customer_reviews.title: It took a minute to get it adjusted but the dog stayed pretty still. Then she just lay there on her ...
customer_reviews.text: I put this on my dog last night at bedtime. It took a minute to get it adjusted but the dog stayed pretty still. Then she just lay there on her back, only her eyes moving for about 2 minutes. Since my boyfriend was freaking out that I was killing the dog, I took it off and she popped up on her feet and started acting like her usual hyper self. She does wear a collar, so it was not just the sensation of having something on her neck that changed her behavior. I will be trying it again tonight when I get home from work, but it does seem to calm her down.
customer_reviews.author: Sherry

customer_reviews.title: This collar does help her with anxiety and is another "tool in the box" to help her feel more comfortable.
customer_reviews.text: A must have for our dog who seems to need her pheromones. This collar does help her with anxiety and is another "tool in the box" to help her feel more comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah M James

customer_reviews.title: Can't really say
customer_reviews.text: I can't speak to the effectiveness of this collar because I replaced it with another a few days after my dog began wearing it. This collar is very thick and doesn't have much "bend". It seemed cumbersome for my dog. I spent a little more and got one that seems to work and is not so stiff.
customer_reviews.author: a New Yorker

customer_reviews.title: Worked....for about 24 hours
customer_reviews.text: I thought this was going to work great. I noticed an instant change in our dog the minute I opened the package. But, after wearing it for about a day, he went back to his normal hyper self.
customer_reviews.author: Heather

customer_reviews.title: Not for us.
customer_reviews.text: We bought this to help with my dog's separation anxiety. After putting this on her for a day and watching her at home while we were away, there was no difference. That isn't to say it's not worth a try with your dog because, lets be honest, the price is right.
customer_reviews.author: SaraC

customer_reviews.title: Helps a little bit.
customer_reviews.text: This does seem to help a little bit, but not as much as I had hoped. One of my dogs is dog aggressive on leash and I had hoped this would help with his fear/aggression on walks. Not so much there, but he does seem better when he sees other dogs from the car.
customer_reviews.author: Jill W.

customer_reviews.title: Did not do anything for my Labrador
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my lab (who was about 8 months old at the time) and it did not calm her down at all. There was not even a slight change.
customer_reviews.author: Whatsername0413

customer_reviews.title: Love it!!!
customer_reviews.text: This product was purchased for my dogs for an international flight. It worked amazing and for the price you can't go wrong!!
customer_reviews.author: Pamela Ouafi

customer_reviews.title: Didn't work for my dog.
customer_reviews.text: This particular brand did not work with my dog. I bought one quite a while ago from Amazon but can't remember the brand and that one really did work. She's hyper and very barky and this one didn't work for her.
customer_reviews.author: Roberta C

customer_reviews.title: These really work!
customer_reviews.text: My dog is afraid of thunder and this was calming for him. However, you must change it every month. I noticed right after 30 days it did not have an effect on him. Also, don't be bothered by the white powder on the collar. It wears off after a day or so and it's not harmful.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel J. Trehey

customer_reviews.title: NOT helpful at all
customer_reviews.text: This did NOT work at all for my chocolate lab on July 4th. She still destroyed part of my house and left teeth marks on a door handle because she was so scared. I don't recommend at all.
customer_reviews.author: Angie S.

customer_reviews.title: But this is good in conjunction with other training and methods
customer_reviews.text: Arrived quickly. It's difficult to tell if it works, but it may be helping slightly. I have bought these for several months in a row and have seen a slight improvement, nothing major. But this is good in conjunction with other training and methods.
customer_reviews.author: K. Giordano

customer_reviews.title: great to have her more calm
customer_reviews.text: helps my dog with her phobics and anxiety. great to have her more calm. not a cure but sure helps her.
customer_reviews.author: LM

customer_reviews.title: great!!
customer_reviews.text: These collars work well in helping your dog calm down, be much more sociable and loving. My vet recommended this and I am glad I took her advice.
customer_reviews.author: fan4nfl

customer_reviews.title: Better option then prescriptions in my opinion
customer_reviews.text: I swear by these. Not saying they work for every pet but I have to say this has made a huge difference for our older dog that has some anxiety. We actually see a behavior change when it is time to replace it. Better option then prescriptions in my opinion.
customer_reviews.author: Russ

customer_reviews.title: did not help my dog
customer_reviews.text: did not help my fearful/anxious dog at all but he is a problem child and we have not found anything except prozac that helps
customer_reviews.author: Virginia Wright

customer_reviews.title: We do see a difference in the Anxiety level of ...
customer_reviews.text: We do see a difference in the Anxiety level of Maltese when they wear the collar. We use the collar mainly when we travel and it makes a difference - less barking and that matters. Well worth the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Jan

customer_reviews.title: Worked great with my dog's licking problem.
customer_reviews.text: My dog normally licks non-stop....paws, legs, belly, his side, where ever he can reach . I put the Nurturecalm collar on him and it worked almost instantly! I've only had it about a week so I can't speak to the longevity yet. I will be ordering more for sure.
customer_reviews.author: P. Newlin

customer_reviews.title: Help for skittish dog
customer_reviews.text: Have a very skittish rescued Flat-coated retriever. Since putting this collar on Sam about 9 days ago, he is a little calmer. I think it helped him!
customer_reviews.author: sk888888

customer_reviews.title: feel like it's worth the money
customer_reviews.text: This product seems to work. I've got a huge chocolate lab, and he does seem to calm down when I put this collar on him. Collar doesn't smell chemically, feel like it's worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Cape2tx

customer_reviews.title: Useful and convenient
customer_reviews.text: Recommended by one of my vets. Helps my chronically anxious dog relax a bit, Travels with the dog, rather than a diffuser that only works in one area.
customer_reviews.author: Ann W

customer_reviews.title: Great product.
customer_reviews.text: Worked in 5 minutes and kept on working for 30 days. Our nervous female 12 yr old Sheppard cross lost all her anxiety and did not even flinch during much of the holiday fireworks.
customer_reviews.author: LM SHEPPARD

customer_reviews.title: Calming Collar
customer_reviews.text: It worked for about a week, then she was back to her hyper little self. Maybe I should have used it as a bracelet😁
customer_reviews.author: Dinah G Quillen

customer_reviews.title: Give it a try
customer_reviews.text: I'm not sure if it worked for my dog or not. But I know my sister in law swears by them for her dog. I recommend someone trying it if you have a nervous Nellie dog like I do.
customer_reviews.author: SherryC

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Did not work with my jack Russell's anxiety at all.
customer_reviews.author: Brittney Stoll

customer_reviews.title: happy pup
customer_reviews.text: These make my neurotic chihuahua a different dog.Thank goodness! I was paying 40.00 at the vet!
customer_reviews.author: diane keyser

customer_reviews.title: Waiting for results
customer_reviews.text: Not sure yet whether this product is effective. I have not noticed any change in my dogs at all and they have been wearing the collars for about a week. I will update later if there is any change.
customer_reviews.author: Miss Ellie

customer_reviews.title: No noticeable difference in dogs behavior
customer_reviews.text: My labs anxiety does not seem to have changed in any way after wearing this collar for over 4 weeks.
customer_reviews.author: Top Dawg

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This seems to be working to calm my recent recused Yorkie that was abused. Thank You!!!
customer_reviews.author: Coastal Blessed

customer_reviews.title: We would highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.text: It appears to be doing it's job. Our dog had to wear it for about 2 weeks until we could see a difference. Our dog is not aggressive but just excitable. We would highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Dan & LaRae Cervantes

customer_reviews.title: have two dogs, one type A and one type ...
customer_reviews.text: have two dogs, one type A and one type B... helps calm the dog down. he is less anxious and does not bark
customer_reviews.author: blue blueone

customer_reviews.title: Not a Fan
customer_reviews.text: We normally purchase the 'Adaptil' brand pheromone collar for our overly excitable dog. Well, I learned my lesson - if something works stick with it. This collar definitely did not work.
customer_reviews.author: P. J.

customer_reviews.title: Works wonders.
customer_reviews.text: I have a very neurotic rescue cattle dog. When I first got him, he would sometimes bite in fear. The collar was recommended by our vet. It worked wonders. We used them for several months. I could tell when the effect was wearing off. We have done ok without them for a while, but decided to reorder a collar when we were having remodeling done. As soon as the collar was on, you could see him visibly calm in minutes. The effect is not as great now, as when we first got him, but the collar still works. The price on Amazon is much less than the vet.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Hope it works for you did not work for me
customer_reviews.text: Did not work for my dog! Not sure but she is a big dog and maybe that was why?
customer_reviews.author: L Hamee

customer_reviews.title: No difference
customer_reviews.text: Can't say I see much of a difference on either of our German Shepards but I'll give it a full 30 days to be sure. Was hoping for a miracle but we'll see.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Atwood

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: It works!!! I had a very stressed rescue dog. This calmed him down and saved the day.
customer_reviews.author: A. M. L. Hentz

customer_reviews.title: Seems to Help a Lot
customer_reviews.text: My dogs are calmer and less stressed when wearing this collar. I'm convinced that the collars work. And our dog "shrink" says the same.
customer_reviews.author: Ron

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: My 3-year-old boxer has been wearing it for about a week and although she's still a little nervous with some things she's gotten much better and more relaxed. The collar is really thin and lightweight and doesn't seem to bother her at all. The only negative is that it only lasts up to 30 days and then you have to buy a new one. But the price isn't bad. By the way, you should put the collar on outside because there will be powder everywhere. Very happy with the product though.
customer_reviews.author: bookworm1976

customer_reviews.title: This did not work for my dog. Will never buy again.
customer_reviews.text: This did not work for my dog. Will never buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Would not purchase again.
customer_reviews.text: Did not do as well as other collars that I have purchased.
customer_reviews.author: Kylie Krugen

customer_reviews.title: Our vet recommended it for our jack Russell who was having some ...
customer_reviews.text: This collar is a life saver. Our vet recommended it for our jack Russell who was having some separation anxiety. It dosn't replace training and don't expect a complete night and day difference but it does take the edge off and I notice a change in behavior when the collar is nearing the end of the 30 day mark. I recommended this collar to a friend as well. She has a Great Dane with high anxiety and she notices a difference as well.
customer_reviews.author: Stacey O

customer_reviews.title: Nurturcalm Canine Calming collar
customer_reviews.text: It is very messy with the white powdery substance that is on it. It did not seem to work for our lab.
customer_reviews.author: L. Fisher

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: It was delivered on time, but very disappointed with this product. No effect at all on my 6 1/2 month dog. Hope this helps other customers.
customer_reviews.author: STG

customer_reviews.title: Good first step to try for anxious dog
customer_reviews.text: Good product. Put it on my dog while some home renovations were going on to help him deal with the stress.
customer_reviews.author: A

customer_reviews.title: did not work nothing to do with seller just product
customer_reviews.text: did not work nothing to do with seller just product
customer_reviews.author: dennis bichsel

customer_reviews.title: It fits him great, but he's still wild as ever
customer_reviews.text: Doesn't seem to work.. I've used calming collars in the past and I have a 70 lb black lab. It fits him great, but he's still wild as ever!
customer_reviews.author: Falon Brawley

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: it works ok but I have to try it again for a month to see if the effect continues
customer_reviews.author: Dolores L Mestuzzi

customer_reviews.title: Not Up to Our Expectations.
customer_reviews.text: It didn't meet my expectations for calming down our dog. Wouldn't buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara Shaver

customer_reviews.title: Was expecting better results. Have a 6lb chihuaha mix
customer_reviews.text: Was expecting better results. Have a 6lb chihuaha mix, a rescue dog senior and only noticed he at least sat with us during storm rather than jumping from one person to another and not settling. Still panting and shaking but again, willing to try a second time.
customer_reviews.author: Brenda Gaulin

customer_reviews.title: Poor choice
customer_reviews.text: It doen't work, but the color looks good on my Weimaraner. It has done absolutely nothing to calm her down.
customer_reviews.author: jean miller

customer_reviews.title: ??? Unsure
customer_reviews.text: Couldn't tell if it works. If it does it's very unnoticeable.
customer_reviews.author: Savannathesweetheart

customer_reviews.title: doesn't work
customer_reviews.text: Save your money. This had zero effect on my hyper dog.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I think this did help, but they only last 30 days, so kinda expensive.
customer_reviews.author: C. McGuire

customer_reviews.title: Nature Not So Calm
customer_reviews.text: Didn't work and you can't return it unless you want to pay a restocking fee as well as shipping which would be almost as much as buying another one of these. Don't waste your money. We have 2 dogs that bark at everything and this did nothing to stop them. It was like putting a string around their neck and hoping they would remember not too bark. Would never buy this prouduct again.
customer_reviews.author: The Buzz

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Worked good on two dogs but not for third one.
customer_reviews.author: Anita Long

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: definitely helped our rescue dog with his anxiety. plan to order more!
customer_reviews.author: Mimi

customer_reviews.title: did nothing
customer_reviews.text: My dog used it as a chew toy and it ended up in pieces. I would suggest another method to help with your dog's anxiety.
customer_reviews.author: sue kelly

customer_reviews.title: Great for anxious-aggressive dog.
customer_reviews.text: We adopted a 2-3yr old male french bulldog that had been physically abused. He was so aggressive toward our pug we feared have to euthanize him. This collar was instrumental in his rehabilitation. I highly recommend trying this collar for any dog (or cat-they have cat collars too) with a behavior issue. Well worth the money spent to try it.
customer_reviews.author: B. King

customer_reviews.title: Great calming collar, well worth it
customer_reviews.text: Works great, our dog just turned 15 and has been having anxiety issues. Thus collar has really helped. Have already recommended to others.
customer_reviews.author: Harley Rose

customer_reviews.title: Believe!!
customer_reviews.text: Admittedly, I was a little skeptical at first when I was told about this product. I use the Anxiety Wrap with some success, but how much could a collar do?! Couldn't believe how much calmer my Westie was with this on. When we take him flying, during take offs and landings he would get fidgety. Used this the last time we flew and it was smooth sailing. I have to admit that it worked remarkably well. Will definitely continue to use this product.
customer_reviews.author: Judy C

customer_reviews.title: doesn't work
customer_reviews.text: Didn't work at all with my dog. I didn't see any difference.
customer_reviews.author: Heidy

customer_reviews.title: Broke very soon
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for an "off brand" DAP collar, and my vet said to try this. Not sure if it worked as well as the DAP, but it is not as hardy, my dog was rolling around in the grass (less than 1 week after having it on) and the clasp broke. I can't fix it, so that was wasted money.
customer_reviews.author: Roxxess

customer_reviews.title: Pretty useless with my dog
customer_reviews.text: I tried this pheromone collar with my dog and it didn't work at all for his anxiety. Didn't notice any difference in behavior.
customer_reviews.author: Ilaria

customer_reviews.title: We have two retired racing greyhounds, both of whom ...
customer_reviews.text: We have two retired racing greyhounds, both of whom had been badly mistreated. One in particular is extremely timid and high-strung. We have been using these collars for months. You can see the dogs becoming more antsy as the month duration of the collar is approaching, and we see a profound change within 24 hours of putting a fresh collar on. These collars have made a world of difference in the comfort and security of our Fast Friends.
customer_reviews.author: W. Castro

customer_reviews.title: Great Natural Remedy for 4th of July!
customer_reviews.text: This collar has really helped our 11 yr. Old jack Russell get through 4th of July way easier than without it. Really took the edge off of his anxiety and calmed him in minutes verses hours. Great buy and love that it was all natural. Will definitely purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Ghubbell

customer_reviews.title: Chewy collar toy
customer_reviews.text: I bought this hoping that it would work on my one year old puppy. It stayed on her for about two weeks with no sign of calming her destructive tendencies. Today, she ate the collar. This does not work in my opinion and I don't feel it's worth the money it cost.
customer_reviews.author: Irish_Vortex_Of_Chaos

customer_reviews.title: it was a 50/50 shot
customer_reviews.text: from all the reviews I read prior to purchasing this item (not necessarily this brand, but this collar concept altogether), it seems these collars work for half of the dogs only - well in my case, my dog fell on the other half for whom this collar did nothing. It really seems to be a 50/50 situation as to whether or not it will do anything to calm your dog, so the only way you can know if it will work is to try it for yourself!
customer_reviews.author: Od&Mike

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Was actually disappointing, but realistically there is no miracle cure for dog behavior
customer_reviews.author: Laurie Davies

customer_reviews.title: Calming Collar
customer_reviews.text: This Collar is ok, it did not do anything for my dog so I would not buy it again. My other issue with it is that all of the stuff on it came off in the box and as soon as I put it on him.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica P

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: My dog is on anxiety medication,so the collar didn't work. I don't know how to return it.
customer_reviews.author: Gloria A Bond

customer_reviews.title: Clasp is poorly designed
customer_reviews.text: This collar ' s clasp is not very strong my dog scratches and loosing the collar. It has to be adjusted several times a day
customer_reviews.author: Suzan A. Thompson

customer_reviews.title: Was fantastic for my dog!
customer_reviews.text: I know not all things work for all dogs. It is a trial and error process. However, this collar was recommended to me by my doggie daycare provider. We noticed a difference the first time out. Left it off the next time she went to daycamp and was promptly asked to make it a part of her backpack for every visit. LOL Now she wears it every time she goes to camp. She is more relaxed and initiates play with her camp-mates. Will certainly be ordering again in the future. Thank you for this product.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Melis

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't seem to work
customer_reviews.text: I don't see any difference in my dog's behavior. She is going through some fear issues and I was hoping this would help with that but it does not seem to have had any effect. I probably will not buy another one.
customer_reviews.author: Judy Osman

customer_reviews.title: worked!!
customer_reviews.text: This product worked for my dog who has anxiety to storms. It seems to mellow him down. It won't provent it but he isn't as upset.
customer_reviews.author: coco

customer_reviews.title: put it on my collie and she became highly agitated ...
customer_reviews.text: put it on my collie and she became highly agitated, running arround could not lay down and rest. She is a very calm dog otherwise but does have separation anxiety. That was the reason I bought it. Mistake!
customer_reviews.author: M. B.

customer_reviews.title: Not a total failure.
customer_reviews.text: My dog was still exhibiting nervous behavior during a recent storm. The storm was not "off the charts" bad and she was still panting, pacing, and generally anxed. She was probably a little better than usual in that she was not crawling over the furniture. I did notice a quicker recovery after the storm was over. Overall . . . . maybe a 25% improvement. I was hoping for more.
customer_reviews.author: PittsburghPenPal

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: I did not see a difference in my dog's behavior. Sorry!
customer_reviews.author: Scott Sharp

customer_reviews.title: Great collar for my guy...
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this collar for approximately 1 year for my 12+ Jack Russell mix. He had a seizure last July and with it some anxiety. There is a noticeable difference in his confidence and ability to relax while wearing it.
customer_reviews.author: InDenial

product_meta.title: Nurturecalm 24/7 Canine Calming Pheromone Collar (Upto 28" Neck)
product_meta.description:
NurtureCALM 24/7 Pheromone Collars for dogs are proven to modify behavior. The collar helps dogs in fearful or stressful situations [separation anxiety, visitors, other household dogs, loud noises, new baby, vet visits, traveling]. The pheromone provides a convenient alternative to diffusers which are limited for use in the confines of a designated room. The calming collar goes where your dog goes, whether it is at home or on the go. Can be give to all ages and to all breeds. Effective and safe, and can be used without long-term effects. 

NurtureCALM 24/7 Pheromone Collar mimics the pheromone that the mother dog produces to calm and reassure her kittens. Dogs recognize these pheromones throughout life. Pheromone behavior collars mimic the natural way to help dogs cope with new and fearful situations. 

Pheromones Help Modify Problem Behaviors as:
Separation Anxiety
Excessive Barking
Destructive Behavior
Inappropriate Urine Marking
Fear Aggression, Fear Biting
Nervous Restlessness
